events.name: End-of-life LIBS handling
events.wd_description: The effective utilization of retired LIBs, which still remain about 70-80% of the initial capacity, can extend battery life, conserve natural resources and protect the environment.
events.description: The effective utilization of retired LIBs, which still remain about 70-80% of the initial capacity, can extend battery life, conserve natural resources and protect the environment.

events.name: Remanufacturing process
events.wd_description: Presents a systematic discussion on the circular value chain (CVC) of spent LIBs, and proposes a 5R principle entailing reduce, redesign, remanufacturing, repurpose and recycling in the CVC process.
events.description: Presents a systematic discussion on the circular value chain (CVC) of spent LIBs, and proposes a 5R principle entailing reduce, redesign, remanufacturing, repurpose and recycling in the CVC process.

events.name: Repurpose process
events.wd_description: Presents a thorough summary of key issues and applications of repurpose process.
events.description: Presents a thorough summary of key issues and applications of repurpose process.

events.name: Recycling process
events.wd_description: Presents a comprehensive discussion on the recycling process, including pre-treatments and mainstream recycling technologies, from the prospects of technical, economic and regulation perspectives.
events.description: Presents a comprehensive discussion on the recycling process, including pre-treatments and mainstream recycling technologies, from the prospects of technical, economic and regulation perspectives.

events.name: Reduce
events.wd_description: Reduces waste by prolonging battery life through proper handling and maintenance.
events.description: Reduces waste by prolonging battery life through proper handling and maintenance.

events.name: Redesign
events.wd_description: Redesigns the LIBs to optimize their performance and extend their lifespan.
events.description: Redesigns the LIBs to optimize their performance and extend their lifespan.
